name: Bluetrain Mobile
tag_list: mobile-marketing-engine, mobile-marketing-suite, mobile-marketing, mobile-cms, mobile-web, mobile-websites, mobile-content-management-system, mobile-sites, mobile-site-builder
overview: Bluetrain Mobile enables businesses and organizations to create professional HTML5 mobile websites. Using the advanced Hybrid Content Management System, marketers and designers can craft fully-customized content that’s easy to update and maintain, while simultaneously feeding in dynamic content directly from a desktop website. Features include forward compatibility with all smartphones, click-to-call and click-to-email links, map links, video & audio embedding, live preview, and more.
